definition[0]: to lie or sit with your arms or legs stretched out in a lazy or careless way
example[0]: He sprawled out on the sofa.
example[1]: I tripped on a stone and went sprawling on the pavement.
example[2]: a blow which sent him sprawling
definition[1]: if buildings sprawl, they spread out over a wide area in an untidy and unattractive way
example[3]: The town seemed to sprawl for miles.
definition[2]: a large area of buildings that are spread out in an untidy and unattractive way
example[4]: We drove through miles of urban sprawl before we finally got out into the countryside.
